item.title: Setting Up A Second Hand Guitar
item.description: In this video Andrew and Nate from Guitareo show how you can set up a used guitar and give tips on what to consider when buying one.

item.title: Effective Melodic Guitar Soloing Tips from Steve Stine
item.description: In this lesson Steve Stine teaches how to make your guitar soloing sound more emotional, melodic and connected.

item.title: Pixies - Where Is My Mind
item.description: In this lesson Tyler Austenfeld teaches the alternative rock classic Where Is My Mind by the Pixies.

item.title: Circle Of Fifths - Black Design for Musicians
item.description: The circle of fifths is a music theoretical tool to visualize the relationships between the 12 notes of the chromatic scale, their key signatures and the associated major and minor keys. / This design shows the Circle of Fifths with the root notes of the major scales in the outer and the roots of the corresponding relative minor scales in the inner circle. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases, and more.

item.title: Circle Of Fifths - White Design for Musicians
item.description: The circle of fifths is a music theoretical tool to visualize the relationships between the 12 notes of the chromatic scale, their key signatures and the associated major and minor keys. / This design shows the Circle of Fifths with the root notes of the major scales in the outer and the roots of the corresponding relative minor scales in the inner circle. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, phone cases, home decor, and more.

item.title: Chord Families Cheat Sheet for Guitar and Ukulele
item.description: This page shows the chord families for the 12 notes of the chromatic scale together with chord diagrams for guitar and ukulele.

item.title: Fretting Hand Positioning Practice
item.description: In this lesson Carl Brown teaches a simple exercise that helps with positioning the fretting hand for playing well-sounding scales and bar chords.

item.title: Carl Brown Guitar Lessons
item.description: This channel by Carl Brown contains theory and technique lessons for playing the guitar.

item.title: Chord Theory Fundamentals
item.description: In this music theory lesson Steve Stine breaks down fundamental chord theory using the C major scale.

item.title: The Beatles - Come Together
item.description: This ukulele lesson by Katie DeNure features a tutorial on how to play Come Together by the Beatles and a beautiful play along performed by her.
